triples.name: Matthews correlation coefficient
triples.relevance: The paper proposes MCC as a superior metric for binary classification evaluation.

triples.name: F-score
triples.relevance: F-score is an existing metric that the paper compares unfavorably to MCC.

triples.name: Accuracy and precision
triples.relevance: Accuracy is an existing metric that the paper argues is problematic on imbalanced datasets.

triples.name: Binary classification
triples.relevance: Binary classification is the classification task that MCC is designed to evaluate.

triples.name: Confusion matrix
triples.relevance: The confusion matrix is the foundation for all evaluation metrics discussed in the paper.

triples.name: Accuracy paradox
triples.relevance: The accuracy paradox demonstrates why accuracy can be misleading, supporting the paper's argument.

triples.name: Genomics
triples.relevance: The paper validates MCC using a real genomics scenario as a practical application domain.
